Package org.apache.drill.exec.rpc.user.security

Interface UserAuthenticator

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Closeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
HtpasswdFileUserAuthenticator, Pam4jUserAuthenticator, PamUserAuthenticator, VaultUserAuthenticator
public interface UserAuthenticator extends Closeable
Interface to provide various username/password based implementations for authentication.

  • Method Summary

    Authenticate the given user and password combination.

    Close the authenticator.

    • setup

      void setup(DrillConfig drillConfig) throws DrillbitStartupException
      Setup for authenticating user credentials.
      Throws:
      DrillbitStartupException

    • authenticate

      void authenticate(String user, String password) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Authenticate the given user and password combination.
      Parameters:
      user -
      password -
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - if authentication fails for given user and password.

    • close

      void close() throws IOException
      Close the authenticator. Used to release resources. Ex. LDAP authenticator opens connections to LDAP server, such connections resources are released in a safe manner as part of close.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Specified by:
      close in interface Closeable
      Throws:
      IOException
